id
type string

type string
description The ID of the stack to which a site belongs
label
type string

status
type string

features
type array
deliverySiteFeature
type string
default UNKNOWN
description A site feature

A sites feature determines how StackPath delivers content to incoming HTTPS requests

  UNKNOWN StackPath is unable to determine a sites feature
  CDN A site has CDN caching
  WAF A site has WAF protection
  API A site has APIspecific protections
  SERVERLESSEDGEENGINE A site can serve EdgeEngine serverless scripts
description A sites features

Site features control how its content is delivered to end users
createdAt
type string
format datetime
description The date a site was created
updatedAt
type string
format datetime
description The date a site was last updated
apiUrls
type string
description A list of API URLs which receive different processing through the WAF than website requests
monitoring
type boolean
format boolean
description Whether or not a sites WAF service is in a monitor state

Sites in WAF monitoring mode accept incoming requests and log but take no action on policy and rule violations
description The response from a request to retrieve a single site
